name: Unstable Arena Royale
description:
#ldjam49

Defend your tower while you call for unstable heroes to help you destroy the enemy building.

Every hero  you call are unstable, which means that their attributes are created by yourself when you click on 'ok' button.

 Warriors, Archers and Mages are available for combat.

* Warriors are balanced. (High HP, medium damage on enemy and building)

* Archers has higher Damage on enemies and walk faster. (Medium HP, High enemy Damage, medium damage on building)

* Mages are building destroyers. (Low HP, low Enemy dmg, Highest building damage)
